thread.title: William Miller

author: William Miller
title: William Miller
text: I received 9 trees as promised last winter. All were planted in compost amended soil. One tulare cherry tree succumbed. I took a picture and sent to Willis Orchards. This February a replacement was received and is doing well (now if the freeze doesn't kill the blossoms). I live in SC zone 8 and look forward to living long enough to eat some of the fruits.
